p: Tallying the case numbers, in 2015 there were 233 excess GBS cases and 38,641 reported ZIKV cases, but in 2016 there were 168 excess GBS cases and 70,916 reported ZIKV cases. The ratio of GBS/Zika reported cases is plotted (blue) in Fig 2, and one sees the transition from GBS/ZIKV(repoted) (= 233รท38641 = 0.60% in the first year (2015) to GBS/ZIKV(reported) =168รท70916 = 0.24% in the second year (2016).
